Real Name: Kro
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Adjacent
THE INSPIRATION FOR COUNTLESS EVILS: Stealth. Kro has PROTECTED: Incapacitate and Mind Control. // FREE: Choose a character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, that character can't have their combat values positively modified.
MASTERY OF HIS MOLECULAR STRUCTURE: Toughness. // POWER: Roll a d6 and heal Kro equal to the result.
THE UNCONTESTED WARLORD OF THE DEVIANT NATION: Protected: Outwit. Empower, Enhancement, Leadership, Shape Change.

pokolo
The heal power is decent but not great… requiring a double power action is tricky and if you end up rolling a 1 not really worth it. Maybe if they had been STOP clicks… all in all not a great dial for a chase, too many points I think
December 8, 2021
Goop
For 125 and a chase i was hoping for something a bit better. The damage power is nice but nothing really amazing, i suppose the ability to turn off someones stat boosting is ok too. Only has sidestep to get around. Overall he's decent but doesn't really offer anything that impressive.
